features: Impossibly slick formula fights nicks, irritation and razor burn
Gives you a close, comfortable shave
Original formula featuring a clean, crisp scent with notes of forest moss, lavender and white birch
90-day supply, which lasts longer than average shave cream/gel

Rich and concentrated cream made with high quality ingredients including Macadamia Seed Oil, Aloe, Calendula Extract, Lemon Extract, Papaya Extract, and Olive Leaf Extract. Paraben Free. Not tested on animals
body.description: Our ultra-slick original formula wth an exceptionally clean scent, inspired by the crisp alpine waters of the sierra. Cremo is an exceptional shave cream. Why? Many shave ""creams"" and gels are foamy formulas full of air - not the best lubricant. Cremo requires one unusually thin, foam-free layer. It's concentrated against your skin, not in a cloud that gets scraped down the drain. Cremo contains unique molecules that become impossibly slick when mixed with water, so your blade can glide effortlessly over skin. You'll enjoy a clean, comfortable shave and astonishingly smooth skin while fighting nicks, razor burn and irritation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Astonishing performance, superior ingredients and dramatic results. Just think of a barbershop and the people who work there. There's pride, professionalism and passion That's the feeling we've captured in every Barber Grade Product. Products we've created with astonishingly high standards - to meet your standards. Not the easy way. Not the cheapest way. The Cremo way. Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream Original Formula Silver Water & Birch Scent Fight Razor Burn Are you tired of the razor burn that comes with shaving? We were too. That's why we created Cremo Shave Cream. It's uniquely formulated to give you a close, comfortable shave without the burn, no matter what type of razor you use. How? With its rich, concentrated formula that's packed with ultra-slick molecules so almost any blade can glide effortlessly over your skin. You get a close, comfortable shave, every time. Gives you a close, comfortable shave Impossibly slick formula Leaves skin astonishingly smooth Original Formula, Silver Water & Birch Scent

Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream A close shave with virtually any blade Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream creates an ultra-slick surface so your blade can glide effortlessly over skin. No matter what kind of blade you use. Fights nicks, razor burn and skin irritation Cremo is an exceptional shave cream. Why? Many shave creams and gels are filled with air. Not exactly the best lubricant. Cremo is concentrated with unique molecules that become impossibly slick when mixed with water. You'll enjoy a clean, comfortable shave and astonishingly smooth skin while fighting nicks, razor burn and irritation. Variety of uncommon scents From refreshing Silver Water & Birch to the energizing blend of Sage & Citrus, Cremo's great-smelling scents make a comfortable and enjoyable shave experience even better.

Original Formula Classic Cooling Formula Refreshing Mint Original Formula Sandalwood Original Formula Sage & Citrus Original Formula Silver Water & Birch Original Formula Reserve Blend Scent Subtle citrus Peppermint, menthol, tea tree Woodsy, masculine Invigorating sage and citrus Clean, sophisticated, fresh Sophisticated, masculine scent Fights nicks and razor burn ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Available sizes 1 oz, 3 oz, 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz Works with virtually any blade ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand
reviews.reviewText: A small amount in your palm is all you need. Add a little water and apply. Very slick allowing razor to pass over skin smoothly and painlessly. Scent is a bit over powering for me, as I do have asthma.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars slicker than snott
reviews.reviewText: This shave cream is great, and works better than the discontinued Neutragena brand. A little dab on wet hands, goes a long way on my face.So far best stuff to use with my safety razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: It lather well but not very foamy and it does not soften the hair that much. Over all a decent shaving cream

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product with incredible slickness to provide a great shave!
reviews.reviewText: This is the slickest shaving products I have ever used!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable for close shaves
reviews.reviewText: I use 3 blade razors because those work best for me. This shave cream does not clog up my razors, unlike some other creams and gels. A little goes a long way, it’s comfortable to use, I have way less irritation, and it smells nice. I won’t use any other brand now.
Great cream that allows for a great shave. The scent is strong but not overpowering and lasts for quite some time after shaving.
